name: Vatis Tech
description: Vatis Tech provides AI-powered speech-to-text technology for accurate and efficient transcription of audio and video data.
longDescription: Vatis Tech is an AI-driven platform specializing in advanced speech-to-text technology, offering transcription services and APIs for businesses, podcasters, journalists, and developers. Founded in 2020 by Romanian entrepreneurs, it leverages proprietary deep-learning algorithms to achieve over 95% transcription accuracy across 18+ languages, with a focus on Romanian at 97%. The platform supports a wide range of industries, including media, legal, healthcare, and contact centers, by providing real-time and asynchronous transcription solutions. Its mission is to streamline workflows and enhance accessibility by converting audio into actionable text efficiently. Vatis Tech offers flexible deployment options, including on-premise and cloud-based solutions, to meet diverse user needs. The platform also provides tools for summarization, sentiment analysis, and custom vocabulary to improve transcription precision for specific industries.
features: Real-time transcription delivers accurate text from live audio streams with a 420ms response time, ideal for meetings and broadcasts.
Asynchronous transcription processes pre-recorded audio or video files with up to 99% accuracy, reducing transcription time significantly.
Custom vocabulary allows users to add industry-specific terms, enhancing transcription accuracy for technical or niche content.
Speaker diarization automatically identifies and labels different speakers in conversations, perfect for interviews and multi-speaker recordings.
AI-powered summarization generates concise summaries and action items from transcripts, streamlining decision-making processes.
Multi-language support transcribes audio in 18+ languages, including Romanian with 97% accuracy, catering to global users.
Flexible deployment options enable on-premise or cloud-based integration for enhanced control or scalability.
Multiple format support handles various audio and video formats like MP3, FLAC, MP4, and MKV for versatile use.
Easy export functionality allows users to download transcripts in formats like PDF, DOCX, TXT, and SRT for seamless integration.
Sentiment analysis provides insights into the tone and intent of conversations, aiding customer support and media monitoring.
Enterprise-grade security ensures GDPR compliance and ISO 27001 certification, protecting sensitive data.
Dedicated support offers priority assistance and tailored solutions for enterprise users, ensuring optimal performance.

faqs.question: What is Vatis Tech used for?
faqs.answer: Vatis Tech provides AI-powered speech-to-text technology to transcribe audio and video data for industries like media, legal, healthcare, and education, supporting real-time and asynchronous transcription.

faqs.question: Does Vatis Tech offer a free trial?
faqs.answer: Yes, Vatis Tech offers 1 hour of free transcription to new users, allowing them to test the platform without a credit card.

faqs.question: What languages does Vatis Tech support?
faqs.answer: Vatis Tech supports over 18 languages, including Romanian, English, German, French, and Spanish, with high accuracy rates.

faqs.question: Can Vatis Tech transcribe live audio?
faqs.answer: Yes, Vatis Tech offers real-time transcription with a 420ms response time, suitable for live broadcasts, meetings, and customer support.

faqs.question: Is Vatis Tech secure for enterprise use?
faqs.answer: Vatis Tech is GDPR-compliant and ISO 27001 certified, with SOC 2 Type II in progress, ensuring enterprise-grade security for sensitive data.

faqs.question: What file formats are supported by Vatis Tech?
faqs.answer: Vatis Tech supports multiple audio and video formats, including MP3, FLAC, MP4, and MKV, for flexible transcription.

faqs.question: Can I integrate Vatis Tech into my application?
faqs.answer: Yes, Vatis Tech provides a speech-to-text API for seamless integration into applications, enhancing functionality for developers.

faqs.question: How accurate is Vatis Tech's transcription?
faqs.answer: Vatis Tech achieves over 95% accuracy on average, with up to 97% for Romanian and 99% with custom models for specific industries.

faqs.question: Does Vatis Tech support custom vocabulary?
faqs.answer: Yes, users can add custom jargon, brand names, or technical terms to improve transcription accuracy for specialized content.

faqs.question: What industries benefit from Vatis Tech?
faqs.answer: Vatis Tech serves industries like media, legal, healthcare, education, contact centers, and podcasting with tailored transcription solutions.
